content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P4: M, 51, OSU professor, Grandview, Biden 2020, policy wonk]
Q: What would it take for Democrats to be competitive statewide?
"Stop talking to Ohio like it's California. Different language, different priorities."
participant_profile: M, 51, OSU professor, Grandview, Biden 2020, policy wonk
preceding_moderator_q: What would it take for Democrats to be competitive statewide?
content_original: Stop talking to Ohio like it's California. Different language, different priorities.
